definition: abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
ten (used in fractions, writing checks etc)/assorted/miscellaneous

pinyin: Ba1 kong4 Ke4 shi2 mi3 er3

sentences.english: Kashmir’s capital, Srinagar, is under military curfew.
sentences.chinese: 克什米爾首府斯利那加正處於軍事戒嚴狀態之中。

sentences.english: But Kashmir isn't just a proxy for India-Pakistan conflict.
sentences.chinese: 但克什米爾不僅僅代表着印度和巴基斯坦的衝突。

sentences.english: G. Montgomerie, was quietly busy in surveying the mountains of Kashmir.
sentences.chinese: 蒙特哥摩利正悄悄忙於勘察克什米爾境內的山峯。

sentences.english: His dream was to connect Kashmir to Kanyakumari and from Gurjar to Mijoram through Highways.
sentences.chinese: 他的夢想是用高速公路連接克什米爾和坎亞庫馬瑞。

sentences.english: Kashmiri fisherman rows his boat through autumn leaves in Kashmir's Dal Lake in Srinagar.
sentences.chinese: 一位克什米爾漁民撐船駛入秋天的斯里那加戴爾湖。

sentences.english: Further west along the LAC, another flashpoint lies in Kashmir.
sentences.chinese: 現實節制線更西的另一個焦點地區則是克什米爾。

sentences.english: Hardest-hit were the provinces of Pakistan-Administered Kashmir and the North West Frontier.
sentences.chinese: 受地震摧殘最嚴重的是巴控克什米爾和西北部省份。

sentences.english: The resulting line of control, by and large, remains the de-facto international frontier within Kashmir and, in effect, is accepted by Paksitan and India.
sentences.chinese: 而最終的分界線還是被兩國接受的克什米爾國際分界。

sentences.english: The Kashmir issue is one left over from history between India and Pakistan.
sentences.chinese: 關於克什米爾問題，這是印巴之間的歷史遺留問題。

sentences.english: Kashmir is a symbol, like Palestine, of a sense of injustice.
sentences.chinese: 克什米爾就像巴勒斯坦，是不公正的象徵。

sentences.english: They have sparred and warred over Kashmir ever since.
sentences.chinese: 他們爲爭奪克什米爾打鬥至今。

sentences.english: The Kashmir issue is an issue left over by history between India and Pakistan.
sentences.chinese: 克什米爾問題是印度和巴基斯坦之間的歷史遺留問題。

sentences.english: You call their army staff to visit Kashmir.
sentences.chinese: 你們讓他們的軍隊到克什米爾來。

sentences.english: Fighters from the region have been captured and killed in Kashmir.
sentences.chinese: 在克什米爾，來自喀拉拉的武裝分子被捕或被斃。

sentences.english: Visitors will also be able to dig into Japanese sushi and Kashmiri chicken curry.
sentences.chinese: 遊客還可以品嚐到日式壽司和克什米爾咖喱雞。

pinyin: Yi1 bi3 li4 ya4 Ban4 dao3

definition: 38th parallel, forming the DMZ border between North and South Korea
Andes mountain chain of South America
